clinical_history: Patient with chest pain and shortness of breath.
findings: Collapse of left lower lobe lobe with volume loss.
Well-defined nodule measuring 33 mm in left lower lobe.
Interstitial thickening and reticular pattern in left lower lobe.
Bronchiectatic changes in left lower lobe region.
Mediastinal widening observed with soft tissue density.
recommendations: Immediate intervention may be required depending on severity.
